item.title: Are Metal Buildings Safe from Lightning? Understanding Lightning Safety and Mitigation Strategies
item.description: Are Metal Buildings Safe from Lightning? Understanding Lightning Safety and Mitigation Strategies There has been an ongoing debate on whether metal buildings are safe from lightning strikes. While metal is a good conductor of electricity, its presence in a building does not guarantee complete immunity to lightning strikes. Understanding the potential risks and implementing effective mitigation strategies is crucial for ensuring the safety of occupants and the integrity of the structure.
